mapper.select: SELECT ss.id, ss.student_id, s.name AS student_name, d.name AS dept_name, ssd.homework, ssd.absent, ssd.lateness, ssd.mid_exam, ssd.final_exam, ssd.converted_mark FROM cu_stu_sub AS ss LEFT JOIN cu_student AS s ON ss.student_id = s.id LEFT JOIN cu_department AS d ON s.dept_id = d.id LEFT JOIN cu_stu_sub_detail AS ssd ON ss.id = ssd.id WHERE ss.subject_id = #{subjectId};
SELECT ss.* FROM cu_stu_sub AS ss LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS su ON ss.subject_id = su.id WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND subject_id = #{subjectId}

SELECT student_id, subject_id, su.name AS subject_name, p.name AS professor_name, grades, sub_day, start_time, end_time, num_of_student, capacity, room_id FROM cu_stu_sub AS ss LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS su ON ss.subject_id = su.id LEFT JOIN cu_professor AS p ON su.professor_id = p.id WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND sub_year = #{subYear} AND semester = #{semester}

SELECT su.id AS subject_id, su.name AS subject_name, sub_day, start_time, end_time FROM cu_stu_sub AS ss LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS su ON ss.subject_id = su.id WHERE sub_year = #{subYear} AND semester = #{semester} AND student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cu_stu_sub WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND subject_id = #{subjectId}
mapper.select: SELECT pss.student_id, pss.subject_id, su.name AS subject_name, p.name AS professor_name, grades, sub_day, start_time, end_time, num_of_student, capacity, room_id FROM cu_pre_stu_sub AS pss LEFT JOIN cu_stu_sub AS ss ON pss.subject_id = ss.subject_id AND pss.student_id = ss.student_id LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS su ON pss.subject_id = su.id LEFT JOIN cu_professor AS p ON su.professor_id = p.id WHERE pss.student_id = #{studentId} AND ss.subject_id IS NULL;

SELECT a.subject_id, a.grade, a.evaluation_id, b.grades, b.sub_year AS subYear, b.semester, b.name AS subjectName, b.type FROM cu_stu_sub AS a LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS b ON a.subject_id = b.id WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND sub_year = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND IF(MONTH(CURDATE()) BETWEEN 3 AND 8, 1, 2) = semester

SELECT s.sub_year AS subYear, s.semester AS semester, SUM(s.grades) AS totalGrades, SUM(ss.complete_grade) AS totalCompleteGrade, AVG(g.grade_value) AS averageGrade FROM cu_stu_sub AS ss LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS s ON ss.subject_id = s.id LEFT JOIN cu_grade AS g ON ss.grade = g.grade WHERE ss.student_id = #{studentId} AND s.sub_year = #{subYear} AND semester = #{semester}

SELECT s.sub_year AS subYear, s.semester AS semester, SUM(s.grades) AS totalGrades, SUM(ss.complete_grade) AS totalCompleteGrade, AVG(g.grade_value) AS averageGrade FROM cu_stu_sub AS ss LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS s ON ss.subject_id = s.id LEFT JOIN cu_grade AS g ON ss.grade = g.grade WHERE ss.student_id = #{studentId} GROUP BY s.sub_year, s.semester

SELECT SUM(s.grades) AS totalGrades, SUM(ss.complete_grade) AS totalCompleteGrade, AVG(g.grade_value) AS averageGrade FROM cu_stu_sub AS ss LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS s ON ss.subject_id = s.id LEFT JOIN cu_grade AS g ON ss.grade = g.grade WHERE ss.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT a.subject_id, a.grade, b.grades, b.sub_year AS subYear, b.semester, b.name AS subjectName, b.type FROM cu_stu_sub AS a LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS b ON a.subject_id = b.id WHERE student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY subYear DESC, semester DESC;
